com.joliciel.talismane.corpus

Class AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.corpus.AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotatedCorpusReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SentencePerLineCorpusReader, StandoffReader, TextPerLineCorpusReader, TokenPerLineCorpusReader

    public abstract class AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements AnnotatedCorpusReader
    An abstract base class for annotated corpus readers, reading the various keys from the configuration.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

      int getExcludeIndex()
      Which index to exclude when reading (for training), from 0 to getCrossValidationSize-1.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader

        public AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader(Config config,
                                     TalismaneSession session)
        Add attributes as specified in the config to the corpus reader. Recognises the attributes:
        - sentence-count: how many sentences should be read
        - start-sentence: which sentence to start on
        - cross-validation.fold-count: if > 0, the number of cross-validation folds
        - cross-validation.include-index: if cross-validation, which index to include (for evaluation)
        - cross-validation.exclude-index: if cross-validation, which index to exclude (for training)
        Parameters:
        config - the local config for this corpus reader (local namespace)
